products.title: Pleated Drawstring Pants
products.describe: Known as the go-to for guest-of wedding dresses, Han Chong’s strength at Self-Portrait has always been understanding how women want to feel when they go out. This is definitely not your typical blazer. Crafted from boucle, this blazer has a slightly boxy fit and cropped hem that actually makes it so versatile. Style it with the matching skirt for the ultimate power outfit, or keep things a bit more casual and pair with medium wash high-rise denim, cream colored pumps and oversized clutch. Finish it off with small gold hoop earrings.
